1.title: Brothas
1.plot: Dickie Silvers is a struggling regional actor who's overdue for a big break. Enter lifelong best friend and current manager Ian Hunter, who despite a gross lack of discretion, manages to land Dickie a steady stream of "questionable bookings." What ensues is a ridiculous series of hijinks that will either make their careers...or get them both killed. Whichever comes first...

3.title: Golden Slippa
3.plot: Dickie Silvers is a struggling regional actor who's overdue for a big break. Enter lifelong best friend and current manager Ian Hunter, who despite a gross lack of discretion, manages to land Dickie a steady stream of "questionable bookings." What ensues is a ridiculous series of hijinks that will either make their careers...or get them both killed. Whichever comes first... Holy Wood is a tale of loyalty, love, and hopeful redemption.
